scripts.write:version: node -e "try{require('fs').writeFileSync('./build/release-js-js/version.json', JSON.stringify([new Date(), new Date()]))}catch(e){require('fs').writeFileSync('./build/debug-js-js/version.json', JSON.stringify([new Date(), new Date()]))}"
scripts.deploy:program: gsutil cp ./build/release-js-js/quake3e.* gs://quake.games && gsutil setmeta -h "Content-Type:application/wasm" gs://quake.games/quake3e.wasm
scripts.deploy:version: npm run write:version && gsutil cp ./build/*-js-js/version.json gs://quake.games/
scripts.deploy:assets: npm run write:version && gsutil cp ./build/*-js-js/version.json gs://quake.games/assets/baseq3-cc/
scripts.deploy:precache: gsutil cp ./code/wasm/bin/index.html gs://quake.games && gsutil cp ./code/wasm/bin/server-worker.js gs://quake.games && gsutil cp ./code/wasm/bin/service-worker.js gs://quake.games
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:program && npm run deploy:version && npm run deploy:precache && npm run deploy:built
